[Section: ——————————————————]



Original "Split List"
- TVs : Sitting room & Deck (might ask to swap one for living room TV).

- You have the best TV we have in the living room. I'd like to swap the one we had at the beach in the living room for the Frame that was never used in
your sitting room.
- Furniture: I will move our sitting room and guest room stuff to new place.
<<I may look at Furnish to replacement items for sitting room. If Furnish items fit better in your place, you may prefer that from a measurement
perspective. OK for guest room>>
Sent:02/27/2024 at 07:04 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/27/2024 at 07:04 AM)
Subject:Re: Taking all our stuff

Message 1670 of 4024
This is not constructive.
Let’s move on
Sent:02/27/2024 at 07:05 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/27/2024 at 07:10 AM)
Subject:Re: Taking all our stuff
Message 1671 of 4024
Facts are not constructive to you. The actual written and documented history, serves no purpose in your narrative. Agree, when truth does not
matter, let’s move on. I’d rather be happy than correct.
Sent:02/27/2024 at 07:14 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/27/2024 at 07:23 AM)
Subject:Re: Taking all our stuff
Message 1672 of 4024
Let’s try it for a day or two. I don’t know why things got worse after Dr Brown but they have. Much worse for that matter. You hate me for
everything little thing I do. Rage burns in your eyes in a flash. I’m sorry Inget frustrated by that, but I just don’t see it as something that is healthy or
sustainable.
We can’t live that way and grow healthy young men. I asked last night for your solution. I have asked her several times. Fully committed to any means
you suggest to find peace. I have offered many different scenarios you don’t agree with. Please offer one that you do, and I will gladly comply.
Christ, Christine, it stupid to even repeat your off quoted “definition of insanity” to you again. Even doing that at this point meets the defining
criteria.
Sent:02/27/2024 at 07:24 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/27/2024 at 07:25 AM)
Subject:Lay Down Your Sword Please
Message 1673 of 4024
I am happy to sign up for breakfast on a Saturday but will confirm that is actually an option and not both lunch and breakfast.
I will say I am concerned about finances. It appears you are not as concerned about run rates or getting reimbursed for things so perhaps I am being
too conservative. Just lmk.
Sent:02/27/2024 at 07:25 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/27/2024 at 07:25 AM)
Subject:SAAS robotics food

Message 1674 of 4024
Ok, please let me know then. I think he will like that.
I’m concerned about our burn. Very. But we have no way to coordinate. Everything falls through the cracks with the RO. I have long documented-
back to July when we had running list, we will crash and burn. I have mentioned it along the way. I’ve been mentally preparing for it. Maybe like you
prepared to leave me.
I have tried recently as you began calling it out. I’m all ears. But we have no platform to resolve. Just let me know what you want to do. Otherwise, I’ll
see ya the the poor house. I’m done fighting for what’s right.
Sent:02/27/2024 at 07:32 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/27/2024 at 07:35 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS robotics food
Message 1675 of 4024
I’ll sign up for the second Saturday breakfast.
You being employed is a huge factor Robert. You  are willfully unemployed at this time. That term will be raised at mediation I guarantee. Our burn
is a reflection of when you had a job. Lawyers advice to get a place of equivalent is only relevant if the income in is the same. It is not.
We either ratchet down burn or you get a job. The math is simple.
Sent:02/27/2024 at 07:38 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/27/2024 at 07:38 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS robotics food
Message 1676 of 4024
Are you living in the same place, with the same bills? I spent six months in a dump, far away from my kids. I know that’s not 50/50.
And I agree it would be easier to find employment if I had even the slightest idea of when I can see my children. I don’t. That is my number one
priority. Period.
You can say it should be paying for our lifestyle. It’s not. It’s having the family I brought into this world. Sorry...
Happy to chat, but this is going in circles and you won’t facilitate that.
Sent:02/27/2024 at 07:43 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/27/2024 at 07:48 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS robotics food
Message 1677 of 4024
Today is just another day of why we need this. We do it almost every day. You lob grenades at me then ask why I’m not bringing you flowers. What
do you think?
Sent:02/27/2024 at 07:47 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/27/2024 at 07:49 AM)
Subject:Re: Lay Down Your Sword Please

Message 1678 of 4024

Let’s spend on porn, massages,  new clothes furniture, big place, etc. il

Sent:02/27/2024 at 08:04 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/27/2024 at 09:22 AM)
Subject:Re: Saas breakfast sign up
Message 1685 of 4024
So after this morning, allow me to state the obvious- one thing we both do is read something, predetermine what it means, no matter what it says,
pervert it, and reply by saying "what you are basically saying is... " when it is almost never the case.
It is easy to do in this flame war format that was made to coordinate drop-off times. But it NEVER helps. Not a single time has it helped ever. So, I
might suggest in the spirit of working constructively working together is we stop that?
The person saying the words know what they are really saying. Telling them that they are "basically" saying something that they did not, but fits our
own narrative, spins us down a counterproductive rabbit hole. It is always pointless.
Should we stop?
Sent:02/27/2024 at 08:13 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/27/2024 at 09:22 AM)
Subject:Helpful Suggestion
Message 1686 of 4024
Given that everything has to go through here or attorneys now, we might be screwed this week. I assume Anna Lisa sent you the asks from last week

PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that Lisa Ann Sharpe, Respondent’s attorney, will be

From:Robert Moyer

unavailable to respond to demands or motions that may require a response or attendance at
any hearing during the following dates:
• January 24 – February 3, 2024
• February 8-9, 15, 2024
• February 19 – March 1, 2024

If we want to mutually agree that we start using the new rules (I'll share again if you like) and you just won't press charges that would be helpful.
Otherwise, you are always able to contact me.

I’m in back to back today.

I manage it pretty closely now, as I have shared, to keep it moving up.

Hey, it was great to hear about how your team's been handling all the recent challenges, especially with everything changing so much. Sounds like
even with Linda shaking things up a bit, you guys are getting the spotlight you’ve worked so hard for. It’s been a long time coming, hasn’t it? I know
this might be a bit of a hard stretch, but looking back, I you’ll see it's all been worth it. You’ve got a knack for making the most out of every situation,
and I’m confident you’re going to shine, and the team will come out the other side even stronger. Even though things are changing between us, I’m
still super proud of you. Christine, you’re something special.

Message 1731 of 4024
I am trying to be very unemotional but still factual about my disappointment.
The RO is not what we agreed on despite the agreement below. This costs thousands of dollars. It would save us money to just say "no" rather than
say "Agree to RO updates" and then not.
Please advise if you and Annalisa are not planning to go with what we agreed to, and I'll decide how to proceed. After the explicit "what if" detailed
explanations for the changes this is frustrating.
I'll be blunt. This sucks. Last time you said "I'm in control" so I assume you are. Disappointing
Sent:02/29/2024 at 02:30 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/29/2024 at 03:35 PM)
Subject:Re: Round II: RO Updates
Message 1732 of 4024
Hey-
I see our lawyers are burning money trying to figure out what you want. What you and I agreed to vs what Annalisa sent. Her response is pretty coy
and does not  offering any explanation for the mismatch.
I really would not be bugging you because I have enjoyed the “peace and the pace” we have been using the last few days. But in this case we are
spending real tuition money trying to mind read.
Any thoughts how we can stop the billing?
Thanks!
Sent:02/29/2024 at 04:39 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/29/2024 at 04:40 PM)
Subject:Re: Round II: RO Updates
Message 1733 of 4024
She and I went over today and what was sent back reflects our discussion.
The RO continues to include the language for management of shared finances.
The language for physical threats was removed.
For OFW we added the emergency calls option. After further discussion, the other exception would likely be covered under emergency.
First email, added FYI. The other exception basically would open up all email.
You also saw that we sent proposed mediation dates for Summer.
Sent:02/29/2024 at 04:43 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/29/2024 at 04:44 PM)
Subject:Re: Round II: RO Updates

Message 1734 of 4024
So you are NOT agreeing to what you said below?
Your discussion changed our agreement together?
I am happy to show you both where you are not agreeing to what we said in clear language if that helps. But if you answer the above we know anyway.
I hope this is not hard or confrontational.
Thanks!
Sent:02/29/2024 at 04:47 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/29/2024 at 04:50 PM)
Subject:Re: Round II: RO Updates
Message 1735 of 4024
I’ll be at try outs.
Sent:02/29/2024 at 04:50 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/29/2024 at 04:56 PM)
Subject:Re: Round II: RO Updates
Message 1736 of 4024
Hey-
I'll just share. It's tough with OFW with no formatting, but you can probably see it anyway. This also makes me realize this is becoming a self-fulling
prophecy to line the pockets of your lawyer.
I hope at some point (as I think you do) we stop making her rich and let you and I just communicate like adults. I get that it will take time and a
demonstrated history, however.

From OFW:
Below is what I think we can agree on. I included "urgent updates" to the OFW call approvals and will adhere to the spirit. The purpose is if we have
plans that go sideways that result in an inconvenient hardship or an urgent FYI but are not technically an "emergency." School nurse call or missed
